name: Deco Party (Kalena)
description:
A 1920s reimagination of Mario Party. Players can roll dice, move spaces, collect coins, and trade coins for stars. The game is Local Co-Op and was created in Unity using C#. Done as a portfolio project for my dual enrolled Game Design class.

In this game, I made most of the art assets. I created the texture for everything in this game. I made the board textures, character textures, and the building textures.
